HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Standardní doprava po ČR: 99 Kč, PPL: 119 Kč, Kurýr po Praze: 149 Kč, DPD: 129 Kč, Česká pošta - Balíkovna na adresu: 139 Kč
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: U některých výrobků nabízíme také DOPRAVU ZDARMA – jedná se o produkty označené ikonkou.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: DHL (nadměrné zásilky): 399 Kč, Doprava ONLINESHOP.cz: 399 Kč, Doprava ONLINESHOP.cz + instalace: 799 Kč, Komfortní doručení: 999 Kč, DOPRAVA + INSTALACE spotřebičů u Vás doma: 1 199 Kč

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: PPL ParcelShop: 79 Kč, DPD Pickup: 89 Kč, Zásilkovna: 99 Kč, Česká pošta - Balíkovna: 99 Kč

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store provides a comprehensive set of delivery options, including standard and express home delivery, specialized delivery for bulky items, pickup from parcel shops and lockers, and free in-store collection.
PROVIDERS: A wide range of carriers are used, such as PPL, DPD, Česká pošta, Zásilkovna, and DHL for oversized goods. The store also offers its own delivery service, 'Doprava ONLINESHOP.cz'.
PRICING: Standard home delivery prices range from 99 Kč to 149 Kč. Parcel shop/locker options start at 79 Kč. Bulky item delivery begins at 399 Kč and can include installation services for a higher fee. In-store pickup is free of charge. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 39 Kč applies to most delivered orders.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Free shipping is offered on select items, identified by a specific icon. Specialized services include a dedicated Prague courier, 'Komfortní doručení' (Comfort Delivery), and appliance installation. There are five physical stores for free personal pickup.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly laid out on a dedicated 'Doprava' page, with each option listing its provider and price. The distinction between standard and bulky items is well-defined. While delivery time is provided for standard shipping (1-3 days), it is missing for express and bulky item services. Information on weekend delivery is not available. Overall, the shipping information is detailed and easy to access.
